responses: Welcome to [sheraton hotel ]! How can I assist you today?
Thank you for choosing [sheraton hotel ]. Have a great day!

patterns: I want to book a room
I want to reserve a room
responses: Sure, I can help with your booking. Could you please provide your check-in and check-out dates, and the room type?
Our check-in time starts at 3 PM. Early check-in may be available upon request.

patterns: When do I need to leave?
responses: Our check-out time is at 11 AM. Let us know if you need any assistance.

patterns: Can I order food to my room?
responses: Room service is available 24/7. Would you like to see our menu?
We offer a range of amenities including a gym, spa, swimming pool, and complimentary Wi-Fi.
We are located at [Hotel Address]. We offer luxurious rooms, top-notch services, and a prime location.

patterns: Can I check my booking status?
I want to check my booking
responses: Sure, please provide your reservation number so I can look that up for you.

patterns: I want to cancel my reservation
How can I cancel my booking?
responses: To cancel your reservation, please provide your booking details and reservation number.

patterns: There is an issue with my room
I need to report a problem
responses: I'm sorry to hear that. Could you please provide more details so we can assist you immediately?

patterns: How do I get to the airport?
responses: Yes, we offer shuttle services to and from the airport. Would you like to book one?

patterns: What dining options do you have?
responses: Our hotel features an on-site restaurant offering breakfast, lunch, and dinner. We also have a bar for evening drinks.

patterns: Are there any conferences or events?
Tell me about your event spaces
responses: Yes, we have event spaces available for conferences, weddings, and other special occasions. Would you like more details?
Our spa offers a variety of treatments including massages, facials, and more. Would you like to book an appointment?

patterns: Do you have a parking lot?
responses: Yes, we offer complimentary parking for our guests.
